name: Warrior Academy (Final Demo) ❥ ゴーゴー！U~oriāakademī
name_original: Warrior Academy (Final Demo) ❥ ゴーゴー！U~oriāakademī
description: Warrior Academy is a fanmade visual novel / dating simulator. You play as a new transfer student to Japan's most honorary school: Warrior Academy! Can you navigate school life and teen drama while solving a sinister mystery hidden within the school, all while trying to win the heart of one of the Art Club members?
